name: Mobile House
detail1: User can explore, order, manage order and has an option to give or view others feedback
detail2: Have registration or logging in option with email and password. Also can log in with his Gmail account
detail3: Admin has full control for the update, delete, modify even has an option to make a customer as admin
technologies: React, NodeJS, ExpressJS, MongoDB, Material-UI, Firebase, Heroku etc.

name: LR Travel Agency
detail1: Without logging in, the user can just explore and see package details but can't book a package
detail2: After logging in, users are able to book, manage to book and see other bookings also
detail3: Admin is able to accept or delete orders and add a new package
technologies: React, NodeJS, ExpressJS, MongoDB, React-Bootstrap, Firebase, Heroku etc.

name: Health Care
detail1: Implement registration, login system using email and password, Gmail & Github account
detail2: Users have to use one email address for one log-in option. If one is already used, users are not able to use it for other login systems
detail3: After logging in, users are able to explore our doctors, medicines, and product details
